admission_text:
# **Get Involved with the Kirkman House Museum**

[ Membership ](/membership#membership)

[ Support ](/membership#support)

[ Volunteer ](/membership#volunteer)

## **Membership**

Your membership dues help pay for special exhibits and programs at the museum that enhance the cultural spirit of our community. Membership dues can be paid [online](https://membership-usa.keela.co/membership38), by mail or in person at the museum.

#### **Benefits**

  * Unlimited free admission to the museum for one year

  * Kirkman House Museum newsletter

  * Invitation to "Members Only" events

  * Recognition in the Kirkman House newsletter

  * Access to the [North American Reciprocal Museum](https://sites.google.com/site/northamericanreciprocalmuseums/north-american-reciprocal-museum-listing) (NARM) program and [Reciprocal Organization of Associated Museums](https://sites.google.com/site/roammuseums/home/list-of-roam-museums) (ROAM) network. This gives you free entry to over 1000 member museums in the United States, Canada, and Mexico.

  * Knowledge that you are helping to save the Kirkman House for future generations

[ Become a member or manage your existing membership ](https://membership-usa.keela.co/membership38)

  * ####  Benefactor—$1,000 

All membership benefits listed above, plus ten guest passes and a gift family membership. 

  * ####  Patron—$500 

All membership benefits listed above, plus eight guest passes.

  * ####  Family—$250 

Membership benefits listed above for all...

collections_text:
## **Where history, heirlooms and heartfelt stories bring Walla Walla’s past to life.**

## **Winter Break**

**Kirkman House Museum is closed for the winter. We will reopen on March 6, 2026 and look forward to seeing you next spring.**

**During the winter, you can still schedule a**[**Murder at the Museum game**](/murder-at-the-museum)**or**[**rent the museum**](/museum-rental)**for weddings, social events, or business meetings. Click the links above for more information, or call us at 509-529-4273.**
